metadata.title: CVE-2023-5632 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Eclipse Mosquito before and including 2.0.5, establishing a connectionto the mosquitto server without sending data causes the EPOLLOUT event tobe added, which results excessive CPU consumption. This could be used by amalicious actor to perform denial of service type attack. This issue isfixed in 2.0.6

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
libmosquittopp1 - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
mosquitto - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
mosquitto-clients - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.11-1ubuntu1').
